---
format: html
---

<style>
  body {
    margin: 0;
    min-height: 80vh;
    background-image: url("quant_image.png");
    background-size: cover;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center;
  }

  .overlay-text {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 10%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    color: #fff;
  }

  /* Styling for your name */
  .overlay-text h1 {
    font-size: 4rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin: 0 0 1rem 0;
  }

  /* Styling for the button */
  .overlay-text .cta-button {
    display: inline-block;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
    color: #000;
    padding: 0.6rem 1.2rem;
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    border-radius: 2rem;
    text-decoration: none;
  }
  .overlay-text .cta-button:hover {
    background-color: #fff;
  }

  #bg-video {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
  object-fit: cover;
  z-index: -1;
}
</style>

<video autoplay muted loop playsinline id="bg-video">
  <source src="quant_video3.mp4" type="video/mp4">
</video>

<div class="overlay-text">
  <h1>Check it out</h1>
  <a class="cta-button" href="Presentations/index.qmd">View Presentations</a>
</div>
